project1.projectDescription: A lightweight tool designed to consolidate multiple files from a project folder into a single organized text file, simplifying tasks like sharing with AI tools for programming support.
coreFeatures: Consolidates multiple files from a folder into one text file
Supports common file types like .txt, .cpp, and .html
Allows skipping media files such as images and videos
Real-time progress updates with a progress bar
Customizable output file name and location
otherFeatures: File delimiters for clear content organization
Option to exclude unsupported file types automatically

description: AllinOneTxt was created to address a personal need: simplifying the process of uploading multiple project files to ChatGPT for assistance.
The idea came from the repetitive task of merging files manually, which was time-consuming and prone to errors.
The design focused on simplicity, with a minimalistic UI that ensures all functionalities are accessible without overwhelming the user.
The program's core revolves around the responsiveness and clarity of its real-time feedback during operations.

coreElements.description: Allows users to select the folder containing the files to consolidate.
Enables users to customize the name of the consolidated text file.
Lets users choose where the output file will be saved.
Shows the current file being processed and overall progress.

result.description: AllinOneTxt successfully simplifies the process of consolidating project files for programming and collaboration purposes, making it ideal for tasks like uploading files to AI tools or sharing with team members.
